resources.string: In this activity, planes will be identified in the environment and will be marked with white dots. By pressing on the small arrow at the bottom of the screen you can choose the 3D model to insert into the environment. To place it you have to press on the screen over a detected plane. To change from place mode to delete mode you can press on the switch at the top left of the screen.

In this activity you can view the 3D models of the planets from the images in the database. To download the image package press the Download button. To display the 3D model, frame at least 25% of the frame with the chosen image and wait for it to be detected. To reset the environment and models press the CLEAR button at the top left of the screen.
